task.title: Working groups
task.shortdesc: Policy and procedure documents are often written by working groups composed of subject matter experts ("SMEs"). Even if you are responsible for writing the content, putting working groups together is the most effective way of getting corrent content.

section.title: Use a large screen of a projector to permit authors to focus on the actual content
Resist the temptatation to discuss content by email
Bring the documents along to short, informal meetings
